sentences.en: ...their commitment to a society based on equality for all citizens irrespective of ethnic origin.
sentences.cn: …他们为建设一个没有种族差别、全民平等的社会所做出的贡献。

sentences.en: Admin sees all the evaluations irrespective of the stages.
sentences.cn: 管理员看到所有的评价不论阶段.

sentences.en: Divine reason, they held, dwells in all men everywhere, irrespective of nationality or race.
sentences.cn: 他们认为, 处处寓于所有人的头脑之中的神圣的理性, 不分国别或种族.

sentences.en: Everyone is treated equally, irrespective of race.
sentences.cn: 不分种族，每个人都受到公平对待。

sentences.en: He is going to buy it irrespective of what you say.
sentences.cn: 不管你说什么,他是买定了.

sentences.en: He is going to buy it, irrespective of what you say.
sentences.cn: 不管你说什么，他是买定了。

sentences.en: He married her, irrespective of the will of his parents.
sentences.cn: 他违背父母的意愿与她结了婚.

sentences.en: It must be done, irrespective of cost.
sentences.cn: 不论花费多少,这件事一定要做.

sentences.en: Louisa Mebbin adopted a protective elder - sister attitude towards money in general , irrespective of nationality or denomination.
sentences.cn: 路易莎·梅宾在花钱的事上总是采取一种大姐式的保护态度, 不论是花哪一国的钱,不论花多少.

sentences.en: Persistence of the herbicide in the mud was irrespective of formulation.
sentences.cn: 除草剂在底泥中的持久性与剂型无关.

sentences.en: Reproduction is constant irrespective of climate and other variations.
sentences.cn: 不管气候与其他环境条件如何变化,繁殖能力维持恒定.

sentences.en: The course is open to anyone, irrespective of age.
sentences.cn: 这门课任何人都可参加，没有年龄限制。

sentences.en: The idea is a good one irrespective of who may have submitted it.
sentences.cn: 不论是谁提出的,那是个好主意.

sentences.en: The modularity system can then match you with what you need irrespective of which module provides it.
sentences.cn: 模块化系统可以很好地匹配您的需求，而不需要考虑是哪个模块提供的。

sentences.en: The son says: " Irrespective, anyway the girlfriend is changed everyday. "
sentences.cn: 儿子说: “ 没关系, 反正女朋友天天都换. ”

sentences.en: They send information every week, irrespective of whether it's useful or not.
sentences.cn: 他们每星期送出信息, 不管其是否有用.

sentences.en: This also means that you can refer to a savepoint only in the same execution of a procedure, but not from another execution of the same or other procedures irrespective of the nesting level.
sentences.cn: 这也意味着您只能在存储过程的同一次执行中引用保存点，而不能从同一个过程或任何嵌套级别的其他过程的不同执行中引用。

sentences.en: This service should be available to everybody, irrespective of whether they can afford it.
sentences.cn: 这项服务应该面向所有人，不管他们是否负担得起。

sentences.en: We will have the work done, irrespective of cost.
sentences.cn: 不管花多大代价,我们也得要把这项工作办好.

words.tran_cn: 无关的；不考虑的；不顾的

phrases.tran_cn: 不论损失如何全部赔偿

trans.tran_cn: 不考虑的，不顾的，无关的
trans.tran_en: used when saying that a particular fact has no effect on a situation and is not important
